Description: Limestone ostracon, with remains of twelve lines of black-painted hieratic text on one side and a further eleven lines on the reverse.
Curator's comments: Römer, M. 2023. Die Ostraka der frühen 18. Dynastie aus Deir el-Bahri und dem Asasif, Bibliothèque Générale 73, Institut français d’archéologie orientale, Cairo.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393082) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393082)
